# Draft:Internet Vikings

----
}}
Internet Vikings is a Swedish technology company that provides hosting services for the iGaming and sports betting industries. It was founded in 2008 by Rickard Vikström and Victor Jerlin. The company operates data centers in the U.S., Europe, Canada, and Latin America, and is certified under the ISO 27001 information security standard.
The company has been profiled in industry publications such as Gambling Insider, Global Gaming Business Magazine, and G3 Magazine for its operations within regulated iGaming hosting and infrastructure.
History
Internet Vikings was established in Stockholm in 2008 as a provider of search engine optimization (SEO) hosting. The company later shifted its focus toward hosting services for licensed operators in iGaming and sports betting.
In 2019, Jesper Kärrbrink, former chief executive of Mr Green, became chairman of the board. That year, the company also acquired Costa PBN, an SEO content provider. Beginning in 2021, Internet Vikings entered the United States market, establishing operations in states such as New Jersey, Michigan, Colorado, and West Virginia. By 2024, the company reported operations in 24 U.S. states and announced a data center in Bogotá, Colombia, marking its first presence in Latin America.
In 2025, the company expanded its European presence by launching a data centre in Belgium.
Services and locations
Internet Vikings provides hosting services, including cloud hosting, bare metal servers, co-location hosting, and disaster recovery.
It operates data centers in the United States, Canada, Sweden, Malta, the Netherlands, Belgium, and Colombia.
Recognition
The company has been covered in trade publications for its operations within regulated iGaming hosting and infrastructure.
Industry organizations have also recognized the company through awards, including:
* 2022: Global Gaming Awards – Services Provider of the Year
* 2022: SiGMA Americas Awards – Hosting Provider of the Year
* 2024: EGR North America Awards – Cloud and IT Services Partner of the Year
